admission_text:
## M&G Membership

**  
BECOME A MEMBER TODAY!** Not only are you receiving some enjoyable benefits, but your support is making it possible for M&G to continue as a valuable resource to the community by providing educational opportunities for teachers, students, and children and the necessary funding to preserve and improve its collection.

Choose between [**Individual**](http://web.archive.org/web/20210801141130/https://www.bjumg.org/individual-membership/) or [**Family/Dual**](http://web.archive.org/web/20210801141130/https://www.bjumg.org/familydual-membership/) membership levels, and pick one that best suits your interests.

**Join online below, or to join by mail click[here](http://web.archive.org/web/20210801141130/https://2phs4u2o46z03w4psl3jcd2h-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/MG-Membership-Form-2016.pdf)!**

**New/Renewing Members:**
